name: livery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a special uniform worn by servants or particular officials
[ U ] UK a special pattern or design that is put on the things that a company owns and sells

MARKETING the colours or design which are put on a company's vehicles and other things that it owns or sells: They have recently unveiled their new livery and brand identity.in the livery of sth an aircraft in the livery of Air Atlantique Now the company's livery can be seen around the world.
relating to vehicles that are rented: a livery cab/car/driver
